sentence.Network_en: Cover Story: Dense disseminated bornite in wollastonite skarn ore.
sentence.Network_cn: 封面故事: 硅灰石矿石中的稠密浸染状斑铜矿.

sentence.Network_en: In addition to the natural copper and malachite, there are chalcopyrite, bornite , Hui copper, bronze, etc.
sentence.Network_cn: 除自然铜和孔雀石之外, 还有黄铜矿 、 斑铜矿 、 辉铜矿 、 铜蓝和黝铜矿等.

sentence.Network_en: The main copper minerals are malachite, chrysocolla, little chalcopyrite, chalcosine and even little bornite and covellite.
sentence.Network_cn: 矿石主要含铜矿物为孔雀石 、 硅孔雀石, 少量的黄铜矿 、 辉铜矿及极少量的斑铜矿和铜蓝等.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 当前位置： > > > 正文[美矿馆] 斑铜矿(bornite)硫化物及硫盐矿物

list.abs: thereafter we bring visual degree and abstract degree into genetic algorithm and present a new way of layout problem solution specifically applicable to bornite craftworks .在此基础上，在遗传算法中引入了形象度和抽象度，提出了一种新的面向斑铜工艺品的布局问题求解算法。

thereafter we bring visual degree and abstract degree into genetic algorithm and present a new way of layout problem solution specifically applicable to bornite craftworks .在此基础上，在遗传算法中引入了形象度和抽象度，提出了一种新的面向斑铜工艺品的布局问题求解算法。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from the name of Ignatius von Born (1742–91), Austrian mineralogist, + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. a mineral consisting of sulfides of copper and iron that is found in copper deposits
